DataElement.preferredDefinition: Time radiotherapy treatment plan was last modified.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Treatment of a disease by means of exposure of the target or the whole body to radiation. Radiation therapy is often used as part of curative therapy and occasionally as a component of palliative treatment for cancer. Other uses include total body irradiation prior to transplantation._A document outlining the essential treatment issues which will be addressed. This may include the problem to be addressed, the proposed treatment, the treatment goal, the time frame to meet goals, and an estimate of the costs._the continuum of experience in which events pass from the future through the present to the past.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Treatment of a disease by means of exposure of the target or the whole body to radiation. Radiation therapy is often used as part of curative therapy and occasionally as a component of palliative treatment for cancer. Other uses include total body irradiation prior to transplantation.:A document outlining the essential treatment issues which will be addressed. This may include the problem to be addressed, the proposed treatment, the treatment goal, the time frame to meet goals, and an estimate of the costs.

Concepts.definition: Treatment of a disease by means of exposure of the target or the whole body to radiation. Radiation therapy is often used as part of curative therapy and occasionally as a component of palliative treatment for cancer. Other uses include total body irradiation prior to transplantation.

A document outlining the essential treatment issues which will be addressed. This may include the problem to be addressed, the proposed treatment, the treatment goal, the time frame to meet goals, and an estimate of the costs.

Property.preferredDefinition: Time is the continuum of experience in which events pass from the future through the present to the past.  It may also refer to a specific point in this continuum or to the interval separating two points.  It is generally measured in minutes, days, months, or years.

Concepts.definition: The continuum of experience in which events pass from the future through the present to the past.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Events, people, materials and activities uniquely defined by medical imaging.
ConceptualDomain.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine

DataElementConcept.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: TM:  DICOM Time; A string of characters of the format hhmmss.frac; where hh (00-23); minutes (00-59); seconds (00-59); frac=fractional part "000000"-"999999"

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Events, people, materials and activities uniquely defined by medical imaging.
ConceptualDomain.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A comprehensive set of standards for communications between medical imaging devices, including handling, storing and transmitting information in medical imaging. It includes a file format definition and a network communication protocol.:the continuum of experience in which events pass from the future through the present to the past.

Concepts.definition: A comprehensive set of standards for communications between medical imaging devices, including handling, storing and transmitting information in medical imaging. It includes a file format definition and a network communication protocol.
The continuum of experience in which events pass from the future through the present to the past.
